name: People and Projects Podcast
what_you_do: The People and Projects Podcast is a podcast that discusses topics related to project management and leadership.
who_you_serve: The podcast appears to serve project managers, leaders, and professionals interested in project management and leadership topics.
signature_programs: The podcast offers resources such as how to report free PDUs, how to get a Project Management Professional (PMP) certification, and keynote presentations.
business_focus: The People and Projects Podcast provides content and resources related to project management and leadership.
